name: Marso #1 of 1: Day 2 Distribution (Expansion & Division of the Heavens)
description: “Let there be a separation between the heavens.” The next piece in the ‘Genesis Block’ collection refers to the expansion and division of the blockchain, paving the way for distribution. Marso combines the imagery of the clouds, ocean waves, a road, and a star to bring to life her own interpretation of how the blockchain initially launched and where it is headed moving forward while doing it with flare.
